JetV awakes in the Autobot cruiser known as the hidden one.  He looks 
around, not seeing any other Autobots.  "What has happened to them?" 
he thought.  He heard a transmission. And repied.  "This is JetV.." 
leaving a pause and lookin around for anysight of an 
Autobot. "Commander of the Autobots on Earth.  Welcome" the small bot 
said.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Skyburst::
> 
> A small torpedo tube comes through the transwarp portal, and 
crashes on
> Earth. It opens as a bot steps out. He is a camo painted helicoptor,
> wearing the Autobot logo. He had just come back online after being
> deactivated by Decepticons, not to long ago. He had learned that
> hundreds of years had passed. He found out about the Neo Beast 
Wars, and
> had reconfigured himself to fit the modern day transformer.(The G1 
to BW
> size problem, activation code, etc.) He set his communication 
system to
> record.
> "To any Maximal or possibly Autobot forces in the neo Beast Wars, 
this
> is the Autobot Skyburst. If you read me please make contact. I wish 
to
> join a Maximal or Autobot faction."
> He set the message to play looped on incoded Maximal and Autobot
> channels. He waited.
> 
> OOC: I would prefer him to join an Autobot group. Anyway he looks 
like
> the Sandstorm Machine Wars toy.
